dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] UEFA Champions League AV Infringement 2005/6 NRID12498]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2006 7:28 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] UEFA Champions League AV Infringement 2005/6
NRID12498]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/


- -------- Original Message --------

X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000

mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
with esmtp (Exim)        id 1FQhlr-00059W-Ie; Tue, 04 Apr 2006 04:24:19 -0500
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
phils@nr-online.com)        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim)
id 1FQhlp-00059M-2W        for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 04 Apr 2006 04:24:17
-0500
Received: from email.nr-online.com ([217.204.130.186])        by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from phils@nr-online.com)        with
esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FQhln-000FmE-6R        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 04 Apr 2006 04:24:16 -0500
Received: (qmail 3787 invoked by uid 89); 4 Apr 2006 10:23:08 +0100
Received: from unknown (HELO PhilSDesktop)
(phils@nr-online.com@192.168.50.105)        by 0 (qmail 1.03 + ejcp v14) with
SMTP; 4 Apr 2006 10:23:08 +0100
From: Phil Stubbs <phils@nr-online.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tue, 4 Apr 2006 10:23:59 +0100
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;        charset="us-ascii"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 1 (Highest)
X-MSMail-Priority: High
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510
Importance: High
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2670
Thread-Index: AcZB2CU686PxPD+kQkKfHScVu+/JfAV8UAoQ
Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of nr-online.com
designates 217.204.130.186 as permitted sender) client-ip=217.204.130.186;
envelope-from=phils@nr-online.com;
helo=email.nr-online.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.0
Subject: [ABUSE] UEFA Champions League AV Infringement 2005/6 NRID12498
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7
Precedence: list
List-Id: <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com


Dear Sirs,

NRID12498

We write on behalf of UEFA who own and/or controls all rights for the UEFA
Champions League.

We have noticed that your website http://www.free-football.tv/ is displaying
UEFA Champions League A/V content.

We wish to make you aware that your present use is an infringement of UEFA's
rights.  Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of
your web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
express or implied waiver of any of UEFA's rights or remedies, all of which
are expressly reserved.



Formal Declaration

1. I hereby state UEFA are the owners of the exclusive rights to the
copyrighted material and that NetResult are authorised to act on their
behalf.

2. On behalf of the owners of the exclusive right to the copyrighted
material at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith
belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I, Philip Stubbs, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United
States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury
that the information in the notice is accurate.


We thank you for your cooperation.

Yours faithfully,

Philip Stubbs

NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House,
583 Fulham Road
London
UK
SW6 5UA

Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB


Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept out apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.

- --------------------------------------------------------------------------
- ---------------------
NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management
- --------------------------------------------------------------------------
- ---------------------
